nodes.text: The meatlump was the favorite food of the Meatlump gang, which was named after it.
While it was considered a great-tasting food, it had an ingredient list that would cause most people to lose their lunch if they knew.

Meatlumps appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
